Package com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem

Class MouseShortcut

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.Shortcut
      • com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.MouseShortcut
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PressureShortcut

    public class MouseShortcut
extends Shortcut
    A mouse shortcut, which can consist of a specific mouse button, click count and modifier keys (Shift, Ctrl or Alt).

    • Constructor Detail

      • MouseShortcut

        public MouseShortcut(int button,
                     int modifiers,
                     int clickCount)
        Parameters:
        button - Mouse buttons MouseEvent.BUTTON_LEFT, MouseEvent.BUTTON2, etc...
        modifiers - modifiersEx masks like InputEvent.ALT_DOWN_MASK and so on...
        clickCount - click count from the MouseEvent that caused the MouseShortcut creation
